title: Neeko requested to morph into somebody/something else

embed.description: Tinypic™ is a photo and video sharing service that allows you to easily upload, link and share your images and videos on MySpace®, eBay®, blogs and message boards. No account required, upload your photos and videos today!

body: very funny but I'm oldish you know so I don't know what's funny now

replies.body: Why not morph into Braum? Everyone knows that Braum is the only fantasy anyone needs.
Or at least just morph into his mustache.
Mother always said, Braum is all you need.
The irony is that LeBlanc is wearing just as much clothing in this art as she is in game.
you made this? I really like the sexiness mixed with humor, all in a way that comes off as fairly innocent. its really a great piece.
Why would she morph into sexy Kat, LeBlanc etc for male pleasure

> Why would she morph into sexy Kat, LeBlanc etc for male pleasure

What?

> What?

Why would Neeko, a lesbian, morph into sexy kat, leblanc etc for the pleasure of men when she herself isn't attracted to males
dunno about her but i myself would never do that

> [{quoted}](name=zoliking,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=acEnNIh4,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2018-12-04T00:27:34.366+0000)
>
> What?

They are referring to Neeko being canonicaly lesbian..... Though requests like this could take a straight person and change their orientation if it's persistent enough.....

I think the image makes a damned good point as to her lore (and makes awesome jokes about {{champion:50}} loving {{champion:7}} and {{champion:33}} loving cacti)
